fixes.name: MTD Value - Up
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau IF to DAX IF and transformed the calculated field reference to the table-qualified format 'Orders (Sample - Superstore)'[MTD Value - YoY]. String literals use double quotes in DAX.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references the aggregated measure 'MTD Value - YoY' (derived from MTD aggregates/LOD), so this is aggregation/context-based logic and should be implemented as a measure.
